info.additionalInfo:
Credits to user 10363 for his style 15332 Photobucket which is the imagehosting service I am using in this style Known Issues None at the moment Changelog 
v03.63 - 5 January 2013
- Status changed from beta to stable
- Development discontinued

v03.61 BETA - 29 August 2011
- Added a slight black text shadow to all text [thanks=Leomate]

v03.61 BETA - 22 August 2011
- Started counting dates :3
- Started to slowly work again ._.
- Added an Experimental Feature to Round Avatars by 3px all corners.

v03.6 BETA
- Adapted Gecko 1.92's CSS3 codes to Gecko 2.0's which results in generalized CSS3 codes, resulting " Kaskus Aero BETA " to be incompatible to Firefox below 4.0
- There's still some codes that can't be shortened ( -moz-border-colors )

v03.5.2 BETA
- Disabled the Edit Button UI Change due to bug if used with QR & Normal UI

v03.5.1 BETA
- Moved the image to my photobucket because to Imageshack, we must register the site to imageshack onto the image but when i checked it, it has only LIMITED and FEW options. So the easiest way is to move them D:

v03.5 BETA
- Fixed Untransparent & Unreadable .vbmenu_popup
- Moved some sections into this Additional Info Section instead of Description section
- Removed Info & Facts Section
- Removed To Do Section since there's nothing to do in a long time D:

v03.4 BETA
- Reduced the size of aero border from 6px to 2px

v03.3 BETA
- Added Google Chrome/Opera Compatibility ( Sorry, Konqueror users :( )
- Improved Compatibility for Idoenk's Greasemonkey Scripts' Popup
- - Like Kaskus Quick Reply, VBulletin Thread Preview
- Optimized the code a bit
- Fixed bug where some things is not transparent(thanks to: rafic)
